57  /**
58   * Amazon EC2 environment.
59   *
60   * @author Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
61   * @version $Id$
62   * @since 1.0
63   */
64  @Immutable
65  @EqualsAndHashCode(of = { "name", "client" })
66  @Loggable(Loggable.DEBUG)
67  final class EC2Environment implements Environment {
68  
69      /**
70       * Approximate prices for certain instance types.
71       */
72      private static final ImmutableMap<String, Double> PRICES =
73          new ImmutableMap.Builder<String, Double>()
74              // @checkstyle MagicNumber (10 lines)
75              .put(".+\\.micro", 0.02d)
76              .put(".+\\.small", 0.06d)
77              .put(".+\\.medium", 0.12d)
78              .put(".+\\.large", 0.24d)
79              .put(".+\\.xlarge", 0.48d)
80              .put(".+\\.2xlarge", 1d)
81              .put(".+\\.4xlarge", 1.64d)
82              .put(".+\\.8xlarge", 3.5d)
83              .build();
84  
85      /**
86       * Work we're in.
87       */
88      private final transient Work work;
89  
90      /**
91       * Instance ID.
92       */
93      private final transient String name;
94  
95      /**
96       * EC2 client.
97       */
98      private final transient EC2Client client;
99  
100     /**
101      * Public ctor.
102      * @param wrk Work we're in
103      * @param instance Instance ID
104      * @param clnt EC2 client
105      */
106     protected EC2Environment(final Work wrk, final String instance,
107         final EC2Client clnt) {
108         this.work = wrk;
109         this.name = instance;
110         this.client = clnt;
111     }
112 
113     /**
114      * {@inheritDoc}
115      */
116     @Override
117     public String toString() {
118         return String.format(
119             "EC2 `%s` instance accessed with %s",
120             this.name, this.client
121         );
122     }
123 
124     /**
125      * {@inheritDoc}
126      */
127     @Override
128     @RetryOnFailure
129     public InetAddress address() throws IOException {
130         final AmazonEC2 aws = this.client.get();
131         final DescribeInstancesRequest request = new DescribeInstancesRequest()
132             .withInstanceIds(this.name);
133         boolean immediately = true;
134         try {
135             while (true) {
136                 final DescribeInstancesResult result =
137                     aws.describeInstances(request);
138                 final Instance instance =
139                     result.getReservations().get(0).getInstances().get(0);
140                 final InstanceState state = instance.getState();
141                 Logger.info(
142                     this,
143                     "instance %s/%s is in '%s' state (code=%d)",
144                     instance.getInstanceId(),
145                     instance.getPlacement().getAvailabilityZone(),
146                     state.getName(),
147                     state.getCode()
148                 );
149                 if ("running".equals(state.getName())) {
150                     if (!immediately) {
151                         Signal.log(
152                             Signal.Mnemo.SUCCESS,
153                             "EC2 instance %s is ready",
154                             instance.getInstanceId()
155                         );
156                     }
157                     return InetAddress.getByAddress(
158                         instance.getPublicDnsName(),
159                         InetAddress.getByName(
160                             instance.getPublicIpAddress()
161                         ).getAddress()
162                     );
163                 }
164                 if (!"pending".equals(state.getName())) {
165                     throw new IllegalStateException(
166                         String.format(
167                             "instance %s is in invalid state '%s'",
168                             instance.getInstanceId(),
169                             state.getName()
170                         )
171                     );
172                 }
173                 immediately = false;
174                 try {
175                     TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(Tv.FIFTEEN);
176                 } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
177                     Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
178                     throw new IllegalStateException(ex);
179                 }
180             }
181         } finally {
182             aws.shutdown();
183         }
184     }
185 
186     /**
187      * {@inheritDoc}
188      */
189     @Override
190     public void close() throws IOException {
191         final AmazonEC2 aws = this.client.get();
192         try {
193             final Instance instance = aws.describeInstances(
194                 new DescribeInstancesRequest().withInstanceIds(this.name)
195             ).getReservations().get(0).getInstances().get(0);
196             final TerminateInstancesResult result = aws.terminateInstances(
197                 new TerminateInstancesRequest()
198                     .withInstanceIds(this.name)
199             );
200             final InstanceStateChange change =
201                 result.getTerminatingInstances().get(0);
202             final long age = System.currentTimeMillis()
203                 - instance.getLaunchTime().getTime();
204             final Dollars cost = EC2Environment.costOf(
205                 instance.getInstanceType(),
206                 instance.getPlacement().getAvailabilityZone(),
207                 age
208             );
209             Signal.log(
210                 Signal.Mnemo.SUCCESS,
211                 // @checkstyle LineLength (1 line)
212                 "EC2 instance %s (%s) terminated, after %[ms]s of activity, approx. %s",
213                 change.getInstanceId(),
214                 instance.getInstanceType(),
215                 age,
216                 cost
217             );
218             this.work.charge(
219                 Logger.format(
220                     "%[ms]s of AWS EC2 %s instance",
221                     age,
222                     instance.getInstanceType()
223                 ),
224                 cost
225             );
226         } finally {
227             aws.shutdown();
228         }
229     }
230 
231     /**
232      * Calculate cost of time spent, in points (one millionth of USD).
233      * @param type Type of EC2 instance
234      * @param zone Availability zone
235      * @param msec Time spent
236      * @return The price of the instance time
237      * @throws IOException If IO problem inside
238      */
239     private static Dollars costOf(final String type, final String zone,
240         final long msec) throws IOException {
241         assert zone != null;
242         final int hours = (int) (1 + msec / TimeUnit.HOURS.toMillis(1));
243         Double hourly = 1d;
244         for (Map.Entry<String, Double> ent : EC2Environment.PRICES.entrySet()) {
245             if (type.matches(ent.getKey())) {
246                 hourly = ent.getValue();
247                 break;
248             }
249         }
250         return new Dollars((long) (hours * hourly * Tv.MILLION));
251     }
